ZElmo De Witt (nke nwụrụ n'afọ 2011) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na South Africa, onye rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nduzi na onye na-emepụta ihe. 
Ihe nkiri ya gụnyere Debbie (1965), The Last Lion (1972), Ter Wille van Christen (1975), Grensbasis 13 (1979) na You Must Be Joking! (1986). Ọ bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri, onye ọrụ ya were ihe karịrị afọ iri atọ, site na 1959 ruo 1992
Keyan Tomaselli na-ewere ya dị ka onye nduzi Afrikaans bụ ndị "mere ihe nkiri nke na-emegide onyinyo "ugbo" nke Afrikaner".
